item.title: Alerting System (Audio/Visual) – Flight Deck Call Visual Alerting System (Lights and EICAS Messages)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided the flight deck audio alerting system is operative.

note.para: The Captain or designee will verbally advise the occupants of the Upper Deck Compartments of normal and emergency procedures when the alerting system is inoperative.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel "FLT DK CALL ALERT SYS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
